data.text:
After achieving her first victory as a member of 
team <Sirius>, Silence Suzuka's breakthrough began-
data.processed:
<story>After achieving her first victory as a member of 
<story>team <Sirius>, Silence Suzuka's breakthrough began-

data.text:
She's escaping again today! Silence Suzuka won't 
give up the lead! The others are increasing 
their speed but still can't keep up!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>She's escaping again today! Silence Suzuka won't 
<story>give up the lead! The others are increasing 
<story>their speed but still can't keep up!

data.text:
Escape and escape, then at the end pull farther 
away! "Escape and Follow Through" Silence Suzuka, 
wins her second consecutive Major!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Escape and escape, then at the end pull farther 
<story>away! "Escape and Follow Through" Silence Suzuka, 
<story>wins her second consecutive Major!

data.text: Haa… haa… fuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… fuu…

data.text: Haa… fuu… fuee…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Haa… fuu… fuee…

data.text:
Hiii… S-seriously trying to keep up 
with Suzuka's speed is roooough~!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Hiii… S-seriously trying to keep up 
<story>with Suzuka's speed is roooough~!

data.text:
Then again, if you go at your own pace, she'll 
gradually pull away, and at the end you won't 
be able to catch up~ Mumumuuuu~…!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Then again, if you go at your own pace, she'll 
<story>gradually pull away, and at the end you won't 
<story>be able to catch up~ Mumumuuuu~…!

data.text:
Again!! Let's run it again!! 
Let's gooo Suzuka, and Spe-chan!!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Again!! Let's run it again!! 
<story>Let's gooo Suzuka, and Spe-chan!!

data.text: Yeah, you got it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Yeah, you got it.

data.text: Ueeeee?! Can't we at least take a 5 minute break?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeeee?! Can't we at least take a 5 minute break?!

data.text:
From the start she just runs and runs, and then pulls away at the 
end. Silence Suzuka's one crazy Uma Musume, isn't she…?!
data.name: Reporter A
data.processed:
<story>From the start she just runs and runs, and then pulls away at the 
<story>end. Silence Suzuka's one crazy Uma Musume, isn't she…?!

data.text:
I'm looking forward to the next one! 
I keep wondering how the next race will turn out!
data.name: Reporter B
data.processed:
<story>I'm looking forward to the next one! 
<story>I keep wondering how the next race will turn out!

data.text: Lately, Suzuka's been gettin' an insane amount of attention, huh?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Lately, Suzuka's been gettin' an insane amount of attention, huh?

data.text:
Winning Majors consecutively is impressive by itself, 
but the way she does it is also awe-inspiring.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Winning Majors consecutively is impressive by itself, 
<story>but the way she does it is also awe-inspiring.

data.text: Yes… it's no ordinary "Escape" that Suzuka has.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>Yes… it's no ordinary "Escape" that Suzuka has.

data.text:
Just like there are various individual personalities, 
we Uma Musume have several different individualities 
when it comes to our running style.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Just like there are various individual personalities, 
<story>we Uma Musume have several different individualities 
<story>when it comes to our running style.

data.text:
For me, my strengths are my stamina, ability to adjust 
on-the-fly, and being able to quickly get in to a good position. 
It's a royal road pattern-
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>For me, my strengths are my stamina, ability to adjust 
<story>on-the-fly, and being able to quickly get in to a good position. 
<story>It's a royal road pattern-

data.text:
Brian-san can use her explosive leg power for a long time, so 
during the middle, she'll hold back. When she reaches the last 
straight, she'll aggressively push through everyone.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Brian-san can use her explosive leg power for a long time, so 
<story>during the middle, she'll hold back. When she reaches the last 
<story>straight, she'll aggressively push through everyone.

data.text:
Rice-san will convert the stamina she's saved into a Long Spurt 
to shutout and eventually wear down her rivals.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Rice-san will convert the stamina she's saved into a Long Spurt 
<story>to shutout and eventually wear down her rivals.

data.text:
We've each settled on a style that is adapted 
to our abilities, and we investigate it thoroughly 
to make it our best chance at winning.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>We've each settled on a style that is adapted 
<story>to our abilities, and we investigate it thoroughly 
<story>to make it our best chance at winning.

data.text:
That being the case, Suzuka-san's style would be one that many 
consider the ideal. But everyone else that tried it, could only 
say it was impossible-
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That being the case, Suzuka-san's style would be one that many 
<story>consider the ideal. But everyone else that tried it, could only 
<story>say it was impossible-

data.text:
Using that incredible speed from the start to pull 
away, and continuing to the goal just like that, 
sounds like a dream-like running style.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Using that incredible speed from the start to pull 
<story>away, and continuing to the goal just like that, 
<story>sounds like a dream-like running style.

data.text:
Using that incredible speed from the start to pull 
away, and continuing to the goal just like that, 
sounds like a dream-like running style.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Using that incredible speed from the start to pull 
<story>away, and continuing to the goal just like that, 
<story>sounds like a dream-like running style.

data.text:
But, that dream-like style is actually 
being used by Suzuka, isn't it?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>But, that dream-like style is actually 
<story>being used by Suzuka, isn't it?

data.text:
I want to see more and more of it from now on. Suzuka's running 
style that you can't help but think is a dream…!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>I want to see more and more of it from now on. Suzuka's running 
<story>style that you can't help but think is a dream…!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka's running style. Not only the fans, but even the 
Uma Musume are taking notice of that dream-like style.
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka's running style. Not only the fans, but even the 
<story>Uma Musume are taking notice of that dream-like style.

data.text:
In the same way that she's pursuing that "scenery", 
everyone else wishes to see her one-of-a-kind running style.
data.processed:
<story>In the same way that she's pursuing that "scenery", 
<story>everyone else wishes to see her one-of-a-kind running style.

data.text: Trainer-san, pardon the intrusion.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san, pardon the intrusion.

data.text: What's up? Did you forget something?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>What's up? Did you forget something?

data.text: What's wrong? Did you forget something?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>What's wrong? Did you forget something?

data.text:
No, I was just wondering if my next race has been decided yet. 
I thought it would be fine to ask you about it.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>No, I was just wondering if my next race has been decided yet. 
<story>I thought it would be fine to ask you about it.

data.text:
I thought if I knew what my next race was, I could decide 
on what my next training goal would be. Other than that… maybe 
there'd be some merit to it?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I thought if I knew what my next race was, I could decide 
<story>on what my next training goal would be. Other than that… maybe 
<story>there'd be some merit to it?

data.text:
For Silence Suzuka herself to proactively 
consult me about races is pretty rare.
data.processed:
<story>For Silence Suzuka herself to proactively 
<story>consult me about races is pretty rare.

data.text:
This might be another sign of just how 
content she is with her running.
data.processed:
<story>This might be another sign of just how 
<story>content she is with her running.

data.text: Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].

data.text: Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Next, I'm thinking of having you enter the [Kinko Sho].

data.text: [Kinko Sho]…is a 2000m race, right?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>[Kinko Sho]…is a 2000m race, right?

data.text:
Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the 
start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the 
<story>start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.

data.text:
Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the 
start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, but for someone like Suzuka who runs at top speed from the 
<story>start, the extended distance might make you a bit uneasy.

data.text:
But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's 
impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle 
middle distance races.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's 
<story>impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle 
<story>middle distance races.

data.text:
But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's 
impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle 
middle distance races.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But, with the way you are now, Suzuka, I don't think it's 
<story>impossible. I believe if it's you, you can definitely handle 
<story>middle distance races.

data.text:
If Trainer-san says it that way, 
then there's no reason for me to feel uneasy.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>If Trainer-san says it that way, 
<story>then there's no reason for me to feel uneasy.

data.text:
Besides, as a way to confirm whether my running style is 
suitable, I think it's the perfect chance.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Besides, as a way to confirm whether my running style is 
<story>suitable, I think it's the perfect chance.

data.text:
Got it, your physical and mental condition are improving 
so lets keep on challenging new things!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Got it, your physical and mental condition are improving 
<story>so lets keep on challenging new things!

data.text:
If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka 
Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka 
<story>Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!

data.text:
If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka 
Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>If you get results here, the middle distance G1's [Takarazuka 
<story>Kinen] and [Fall Tenno Sho] won't be out of reach either!

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>G1…

data.text:
But in return, from now on, the training 
will be that much harder.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But in return, from now on, the training 
<story>will be that much harder.

data.text: Fufuu… that's fine.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu… that's fine.

data.text:
Trainer-san. I want to keep exploring the 
possibilities of this running style.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san. I want to keep exploring the 
<story>possibilities of this running style.

data.text:
Ahead on this untrodden path, there must be lots 
of beautiful "scenery", don't you think?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Ahead on this untrodden path, there must be lots 
<story>of beautiful "scenery", don't you think?

data.text:
You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold 
of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold 
<story>of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.

data.text:
You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold 
of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You have my full support. Seeing you taking hold 
<story>of your dreams, is where my dreams lie as well.

data.text:
I will do my very best. 
So both of us… can see that "scenery".
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I will do my very best. 
<story>So both of us… can see that "scenery".
